remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 WMI 路径可以是相对路径或完整路径，因此，可能会出现作用域和指定路径之间的冲突。Because WMI paths can be relative or full, a conflict between the scope and the path specified may arise. 但是，如果指定了作用域并且指定了相对 WMI 路径，则不会发生冲突。However, if a scope is specified and a relative WMI path is specified, then there is no conflict. 下面是一些可能的冲突：The following are some possible conflicts: 如果未指定作用域并且指定了相对 WMI 路径，则作用域将默认为本地计算机的 。If a scope is not specified and a relative WMI path is specified, then the scope will default to the local machine's . 如果未指定作用域并且指定了完整 WMI 路径，则将从完整路径的作用域部分推断作用域。If a scope is not specified and a full WMI path is specified, then the scope will be inferred from the scope portion of the full path. 例如，完整 WMI 路径： `\\MyMachine\root\MyNamespace:MyClass.Name='abc'` 会在作用域 "\\\MyMachine\root\MyNamespace" 中表示 WMI 对象 "MyClass. Name = ' abc '"。For example, the full WMI path: `\\MyMachine\root\MyNamespace:MyClass.Name='abc'` will represent the WMI object 'MyClass.Name='abc'" in the scope '\\\MyMachine\root\MyNamespace'. 如果指定作用域并指定完整 WMI 路径，则作用域将覆盖完整路径的作用域部分。If a scope is specified and a full WMI path is specified, then the scope will override the scope portion of the full path. 例如，如果指定了以下作用域： \\\MyMachine\root\MyScope，并且指定了以下完整路径： \\\MyMachine\root\MyNamespace： MyClass. Name = ' abc '，然后查找以下 `object: \\MyMachine\root\MyScope:MyClass.Name= 'abc'` （将忽略完整路径的范围部分）。For example, if the following scope was specified: \\\MyMachine\root\MyScope, and the following full path was specified: \\\MyMachine\root\MyNamespace:MyClass.Name='abc', then look for the following `object: \\MyMachine\root\MyScope:MyClass.Name= 'abc'` (the scope part of the full path is ignored). ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 部分信任的程式碼無法使用此成員。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[从部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例初始化绑定到特定 WMI 路径 类的新实例。The following example initializes a new instance of the class that is bound to a specific WMI path. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在管理对象已绑定到特定命名空间中的 WMI 对象之后，更改属性将导致释放原始 WMI 对象。Changing the property after the management object has been bound to a WMI object in a particular namespace results in releasing the original WMI object. 这会导致将管理对象重新绑定到新的路径属性和范围值指定的新对象。This causes the management object to be rebound to the new object specified by the new path properties and scope values. 重新绑定是以 "迟缓" 方式进行的，也就是说，仅当请求的值需要将管理对象绑定到 WMI 对象时，才会执行此方法。The rebinding is performed in a "lazy" manner, that is, only when a requested value requires the management object to be bound to the WMI object. 在尝试重新绑定之前，只需对属性进行更改（例如，同时修改作用域和路径属性）即可。Changes can be made to more than just the property before attempting to rebind (for example, modifying the scope and path properties simultaneously). ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 部分信任的程式碼無法使用此成員。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[从部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用默认命名空间初始化 类的新实例，然后更改 的 WMI 路径。The following example initializes a new instance of the class with the default namespace, and then changes the WMI path of the . [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementObject_Path#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementObject_Path/cs/ManagementObject_Path.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementObject_Path#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementObject_Path/vb/ManagementObject_Path.vb#1)]
